mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invitation from Old Veterans of Company A, 24th VA
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Invitation from “Old Veterans of Company A, 24th VA, Request pleasure of your company at the Jacksonville Hotel on Wednesday, June 15th, 1881 at 7 o’clock pm.” 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
